title: Key User Stories for Advisor AGI

stories.title: As a user, I want to receive structured advice on a complex problem to make an informed decision.
stories.description: The user describes a complex situation or problem and expects to receive a structured response from Advisor AGI, including advice, reasoning, ethical evaluation, and system self-analysis.
acceptance_criteria: The system accepts the user's text query.
The system returns a response divided into 4 blocks: Advice, Reasoning, Ethical Evaluation, Self-analysis.
The advice is relevant and applicable to the described problem.
The reasoning clearly explains the decision-making logic.
The ethical evaluation identifies potential ethical dilemmas and suggests ways to resolve them.
The system's self-analysis provides information about its confidence in the answer and possible limitations.
stories.business_value: Increasing user trust in the system and demonstrating the depth of analysis.

stories.title: As a developer, I want to integrate Advisor AGI into my application via API to extend its functionality.
stories.description: A developer wants to use Advisor AGI's capabilities in their own application by sending requests and receiving structured responses through a programmatic interface.
stories.user_type: Third-party developer creating a new application
acceptance_criteria: Clear and complete API documentation is provided.
The API is stable and reliable.
The API request and response format meets expectations (e.g., JSON).
API error handling is predictable and informative.
stories.business_value: Expanding the Advisor AGI ecosystem and increasing the number of use cases.

stories.title: As a researcher, I want to study the internal logic and decision-making process of Advisor AGI to understand its capabilities and limitations.
stories.description: A researcher is interested in understanding how Advisor AGI processes information and forms responses to assess its potential for further scientific research or improvements.
acceptance_criteria: Mechanisms are provided for auditing or logging the decision-making process (e.g., through system self-analysis).
Information about the models and algorithms used in Advisor AGI is accessible.
Ability to reproduce results for analysis.
stories.business_value: Attracting the scientific community, potential improvements, and system validation.
